snippet.title: BIG HELMET HEROES - Launch trailer
snippet.description:
⚔️ Big Helmet Heroes is now available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series S|X, and PlayStation 5! 🥳 Grab your teammate and play now! 👉 https://bighelmetheroesgame.com
Smash and bash through this wacky 3D beat 'em up! Go solo or team up for couch co-op chaos! 💥

⚔️ What is Big Helmet Heroes?
Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat’em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

Big Helmet Heroes is developped by Exalted Studio and published by Dear Villagers

Follow us:
🧡 Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExaltedStudio
💜 BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/exaltedstudio.com
🧡 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bighelmetheroes/
💜 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hksncHXXa9

#beatemup
